item.title: Strip out health care and social services, the U.S. lost jobs in 2025—something that usually happens in recessions
item.description: “It’s fair to call this a hiring recession or a jobless boom,” said economist Heather Long.

item.title: Sarah Jessica Parker says she only has work-life balance because of the people supporting her: ‘I’m making choices differently than I used to’
item.description: Sarah Jessica Parker took home the 2026 Carrol Burnett award on Thursday.

item.title: Renee Good’s ex-husband describes her as no kind of activist whatsoever, she was heading home before ICE encounter
item.description: Minneapolis Mayor Jacob Frey says the video recordings show the federal government's self-defense argument is “garbage.”

item.title: Philly burbs police stunned by arrest of apparent grave robbery carrying sack with skulls, bones, mummified remains
item.description: "Given the enormity of what we are looking at and the sheer, utter lack of reasonable explanation, it’s difficult to say ... exactly what took place."

item.title: Bill Gates says AI could be used as a bioterrorism weapon akin to the COVID pandemic if it falls into the wrong hands
item.description: "We’ll need to be deliberate about how this technology is developed, governed, and deployed," Gates wrote.
